revised_title: Refractive Indices and Densities of Aqueous Solutions of Hydrogen Chloride and Alkali Chlorides
tldr: The author presents a study on the refractive indices and densities of normal and semi-normal aqueous solutions of hydrogen chloride and alkali chlorides at a uniform temperature of 18°C. The research involved precise measurements and methods to ensure accurate results, contributing to the understanding of these solutions' properties.
